cooper.description: Generate barrel files for Nx workspace projects

copy-schemas.description: Copies JSON schemas from remote URLs or local files to a specified output directory, supporting schema management for Nx workspaces and tools like Prettier, ESLint, and TypeScript.

export-generator-schemas.description: Exports Zod-based schemas from Nx generator files to JSON Schema format, generating individual schema files for each generator to enable validation and documentation.

git-wip-fixup.description: Automates the fixup of Work-In-Progress (WIP) commits in Git by identifying and amending commits with fixup commits, supporting dry-run mode and configurable commit limits.

schemator.description: Automatically generate TypeScript interfaces from JSON schemas

uncommentor.description: Create a new Nx library project with uncommentored template files
